Name: Make It Rain
Effect: All Foes in Range. Reduce the User’s Special by 2. At the end of the battle give the User and every Trainer whose Pokémon was hit money equal to their Rank: Starter/Rookie - $50.00; Standard - $100.00; Advanced - $200.00; Ace - $500.00
Description: The Pokémon calls a rain of gold to fall from the sky. All the greedy Pokémon who threw themselves at the money get in range for an explosion of golden light. Worth it!
